ModulePrefs.title: NAAP lab - Motions of the Sun
ModulePrefs.author: Sten Govaerts
ModulePrefs.description: The NAAP Motions of the Sun Lab reviews some of the material from the Basic Coordinates and Seasons Lab and The Rotating Sky Lab and adds information to put all the pieces together for a more complete description of the motions of the sun. Computation of meridional altitude and stellar visibility are also introduced.
